item.title: October DX Highlights: Trans-Pacific Journeys and Satellite QSOs
item.description:
ðŸ“¡ October Logbook Analysis: Rare DX and Band Activity

October 2025 delivered an outstanding month of radio propagation, allowing me (SV0SYH, KN10LO) to log some truly phenomenal DX, particularly spanning the vast Pacific Ocean and securing contacts with rare entities in Africa and the Caribbean.

ðŸŒŽ HF DXpedition and Rare DX Catches

The HF bands were wide open, enabling contacts with extremely distant and rare DXCC entities. The focus was strongly on Oceania and Africa, with multiple contacts logged over 16,000 km.
